title: [1.12.2-1.6.4][SpawnCommandsTeleport——传送指令]在单人游戏中使用部分服务器指令
author: 恋
txt_content:
本帖最后由 HTL9257 于 2019-4-15 19:39 编辑 

传送指令二次搬运说明因原帖长期未更新 原搬运贴最高只有1.8版本  如今MOD已经更新了1.12.2 且更新了大量内容 故二次搬运
本帖为根据搬运悬赏令接坑搬运 
MOD介绍
这是一个可以在单人/局域网游戏中使用部分服务器指令的MOD比如/spawn /back /home共享传送坐标以及随机传送等功能 适合局域网联机使用  不建议在服务器使用这个MOD 1.10.2-1.12.2请安装spongeforge 插件的功能远比这个MOD强大 
相关指令指令列表/spawn 回到世界的出生点（和服务器里面同名指令效果一样）/spawn.传送回你的床/家/spawn! 将当前位置设置为你的床/家/spawn? 显示世界出生点坐标 以及你设置家/床的坐标高级指令/spawn+ mylavabase 在你的当前坐标创建名为mylavabase的传送点/spawn  mylavabase 把你传送到你设置名为mylavabase的传送点/spawns 显示坐标排序列表 在本维度的坐标会突出显示  /spawn -henrysplace 从坐标列表中删除名为henrysplace的坐标（+是增加坐标-是删除坐标）/spawn+enable 在服务器上启用高级命令 默认情况只有OP有这个权限/spawn+disable 禁用高级命令 /spawn+名字 坐标 在指定坐标创建一个命名位置 /spawn+@ 名字  创建一个名为@ 坐标名字的共享位置 它会出现在每个人的坐标列表中（多人游戏）/back 回到上一个位置（这个应该不需要解释了吧）对于习惯使用/home/sethome的人/home 回家/sethome 设置你的家/home 坐标名字  如果在配置文件中homewithnamedlocations一项设置为true 则传送到坐标名位置 /sethome 坐标名字  如果在配置文件中homewithnamedlocations一项设置为true 则创建你设置名字的坐标/ta 玩家ID  给玩家一个传送请求  其他玩家输入/ok 批准 （对应tpa）/ta no 拒绝传送请求/ti 玩家ID 邀请其他玩家传送到你这里  对方输入/ta确认/ta allow deny all 拒绝45秒内所有发送给你的传送请求/ta help  获取有关ta命令的帮助/spawn help 获取有关spawn命令的帮助/away 距离   随机传送到离你所站位置距离的位置/up 将你传送到头顶一个可站立的位置/dn 将你传送到脚下一个可以站立的位置/top 将你传送到你头顶最高的位置配置文件
下载地址下载地址1.12.21.11.21.10.21.8.91.81.7.101.6.4

replies.author: drwu
replies.txt_content:
421886694 发表于 2019-11-4 09:22
配置文件在哪里啊求教QAQ
應該是這個吧~~
1st the location of the config files:
If you are in single player you will start in your root minecraft folder then open the folder named "saves" Then open the folder named for your single player game name.
 Under that is a folder called "spawncommands-config-folder"  inside that are several config files that do different things for you.   The documentation for the contents of each config file are on this page https://minecraft.curseforge.com ... -configuration-note
If you are in a multiplayer server you will start in your server's root folder.  In this folder you will see a folder called "mods" and one called "libraries" and files such as server.properties and ops.json.   There is usually a folder here called "config" but the data for SpawnCommands is specific to the world map not minecraft as a whole therefore the configs for it are inside the folder for your server's world save.  Usually it is a folder called "world".  Open this. 
Under that is a folder called "spawncommands-config-folder"  inside that are several config files that do different things for you.   The documentation for the contents of each config file are on this page https://minecraft.curseforge.com ... configuration-notes
What are the config files called?  :
_miscellaneous.config - probably the most useful file
_commandPermissions.config - makes commands disabled, or advanced, or op only
_commandNames.config - allows you to fully rename any command
_canSpawnInsideBlockNameList.config - allows spawning inside special blocks
and others hopefully named clearly.
The configuration files will not exist untill the game launches successfully once at which point they will be created by the mod.

replies.author: HooHoo
replies.txt_content:
As_TianBa 发表于 2020-3-2 13:54
为啥我和我朋友联机/back不能用
他会出现这个 advabced spawn commands are not enabled  ...
改一下配置文件
在.minecraft\saves\你的存档名\spawncommands-config-folder\下，有一个文件叫_miscellaneous.config。
把前四行最后的false改成true就可以了
